creator: Faifly, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Akihiko's fate is in your hands. Please help him make decisions during this period of his life.
All choices lead to different situations and can even change his character.
You can control the actions in this interactive episode Otome BL (boys love) novel game.
You can choose what you like in the episode, and we'll see how it ends.
In the end, Akihiko comes again when you go all the way. You'll gossip like best friends. And he will tell you his impressions of the ending.

My First Kiss: Our new novel, BL (boys love) yaoi choices novel game. It has a lot of episodes and bl choices.

Episodes Sinopsis:
Our hero wakes up to find someone lying on top of him. It turns out that this is a naked guy with a stunning appearance! But what is happening here? A cat suddenly appeared in the place of a gentle boy. Bring the handsome man back! Thus began his first morning in the new house after moving. The hero has to get to know his first BL (boys love) experience, understand his feelings, and discover who he is.

Each choice can lead to a change in events or the character's personality. How this period of the leading character's youth will pass depends only on you. A hot and caring guy in a collar, a temperamental guy with heterochromia, or a grown-up tattooed professor who is challenging to seduce? Do you already have a choice? Or maybe you want the hero to have sweet polyamorous love and a triple kiss? Choose your romantic story. You also have the opportunity to change outfits and hairstyles. In the section "Special dreams," you can see what Akihiko dreamed. There are lustful, slightly scary, and psychedelic dreams.

We recommend this game to you if:
* You relish Episodes and novel choices
* You like yaoi games and yuri.
* You prefer Otome BL (boys love) novel games.
* You enjoy visual novels about passion and drama.
* You want spicy episodes and strong love feelings.

Supported languages:
English, Ukrainian.

We are now working on adding new languages with the next release. Thank you so much for your attention and participation.

If you would like to get more info about any aspects - join our discord community - https://discord.gg/kVp4MrANnU or our telegram https://t.me/faifly_games
descriptionShort: Our visual novel game is about boys' love.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The new game is born! Enjoy :)

title: Episode Boys Love: Choices BL

creator: Faifly, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Introducing "My First Kiss" an engaging Otome BL (boys love) game that combines the excitement of yaoi and yuri in a dramatic visual novel format. Immerse yourself in a thrilling interactive story where your choices shape Akihiko's fate and personality, ultimately determining the outcome of his passionate and romantic journey.

In this episode-based game, experience Akihiko's first BL love after waking up to a stunning man who turns into a cat! Unravel the mystery, explore your feelings, and discover your true self. Dive into a world filled with unique characters like a hot and caring guy in a collar, a temperamental heterochromia guy, or a seductive tattooed professor.

Key Features:

* Multiple endings based on your choices
* Character customization with different outfits and hairstyles
* Inclusive love stories and characters
* Love triangle and polyamorous love options
* Special dreams section with lustful, slightly scary, and psychedelic dreams

This game is perfect for those who:

* Enjoy Otome, yaoi, and yuri games
* Love interactive stories with romance choices
* Appreciate visual novels with passion and drama
* Desire spicy episodes and intense love feelings

Supported languages: English, Ukrainian. More languages coming soon!

Join our growing community:
* Discord https://discord.gg/kVp4MrANnU
* Telegram https://t.me/faifly_games
descriptionShort: My First Kiss - otome visual novel that contains elements of BL, yaoi, and yuri

descriptionShort: Otome visual novel that contains elements of BL, yaoi, and yuri
title:
Episode Boys Love: Choices BL
1.5.12

creator: Faifly, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Embark on "My First Kiss," a riveting Otome visual novel that weaves the tenderness of BL with the depth of yaoi and the allure of yuri into its fabric. This game stands out in the BL genre, offering an intricate narrative experience where choice is paramount, set against a series of engaging episodes that delve into the essence of love and relationship dynamics.

Languages supported include English, Українська, Español, Deutsch, 日本語, Français, and Português, inviting a global audience to partake in its rich, episodic storyline.

Step into a world where your decisions sculpt the narrative, propelling you through episodes that blend romance, mystery, and the transformative journey of love. Akihiko's first encounter with BL romance begins in an episode where he awakes beside a man with the mystical ability to shift forms. Each episode in this visual novel invites you to explore the depths of BL and yaoi, enriched with yuri elements to diversify the storytelling.

Key Features:

Varied endings shaped by your choices, underscoring the episodic nature of this visual novel.
Extensive character customization that allows players to express themselves within the thematic scope of BL.
A broad spectrum of love stories, from intense yaoi to gentle yuri moments, all woven into the episodic narrative.
The chance to navigate complex relationships, including love triangles and polyamorous scenarios, adding depth to each episode.
A "Special Dreams" feature, offering insights into the characters' innermost desires and fears across episodes.
Ideal for players who:

Cherish Otome games with a solid foundation in BL and yaoi, sprinkled with the nuances of yuri, and delivered through captivating episodes.
Value the power of choice in interactive storytelling, where decisions influence the episodic unfolding of a Boys Love tale.

title:
My First Boys Love Kiss: BL
1.5.16

creator: Faifly, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Embark on "My First Kiss," a riveting Otome visual novel that weaves the tenderness of BL with the depth of yaoi and the allure of yuri into its fabric. This game stands out in the BL genre, offering an intricate narrative experience where choice is paramount, set against a series of engaging episodes that delve into the essence of love and relationship dynamics.

Languages supported include English, Українська, Español, Deutsch, 日本語, Français, and Português, inviting a global audience to partake in its rich, episodic storyline.

Step into a world where your decisions sculpt the narrative, propelling you through episodes that blend romance, mystery, and the transformative journey of love. Akihiko's first encounter with BL romance begins in an episode where he awakes beside a man with the mystical ability to shift forms. Each episode in this visual novel invites you to explore the depths of BL and yaoi, enriched with yuri elements to diversify the storytelling.

Key Features:

Varied endings shaped by your choices, underscoring the episodic nature of this visual novel.
Extensive character customization that allows players to express themselves within the thematic scope of BL.
A broad spectrum of love stories, from intense yaoi to gentle yuri moments, all woven into the episodic narrative.
The chance to navigate complex relationships, including love triangles and polyamorous scenarios, adding depth to each episode.
A "Special Dreams" feature, offering insights into the characters' innermost desires and fears across episodes.
Ideal for players who:

Cherish Otome games with a solid foundation in BL and yaoi, sprinkled with the nuances of yuri, and delivered through captivating episodes.
Value the power of choice in interactive storytelling, where decisions influence the episodic unfolding of a Boys Love tale.
